body_html:
Thanks for the details, @jiarenyf.

Unfortunately, this is an existing (and undocumented) limitation of current NNAPI functionality. Once enabled, it does not properly handle resizes. This should be reported as an error (we'll fix that directly), though longer term we do plan on allowing dynamic resizes.

The best way to work around this at the moment is just as you mentioned; when you have to resize an input tensor, first disable NNAPI, then perform the resize, then re-enable NNAPI. This operation is non-trivial, however, so it should be done as infrequently as possible.
